description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. CAUTION! These five arcade-style card games are dangerously addictive! Due to the 14 challenging Goals, four game modes, and worldwide in-game score competition over Xbox LIVE, downloading CardArcade may cause addiction...you have been warned! Online rankings require a LIVE Gold membership.
